StringProperty.Name: TargetName
StringProperty.Description: Specifies a file name that this project will generate.

StringProperty.Name: SymbolsPath
StringProperty.Description: The search path used by the debugger to locate symbols.

StringProperty.Name: DebuggerFlavor
StringProperty.Description: The debug rule selected as the active debugger.

StringProperty.Name: LocalDebuggerWorkingDirectory
StringProperty.Description: The application's working directory. By default, the directory containing the project file.

StringProperty.Name: LocalDebuggerCommandArguments
StringProperty.Description: The command line arguments to pass to the application.

BoolProperty.Name: LocalDebuggerAttach
BoolProperty.Description: Specifies whether the debugger should attempt to attach to an existing process when debugging starts.

StringListProperty.Name: LocalDebuggerEnvironment
StringListProperty.Description: Specifies the environment for the debugee, or variables to merge with existing environment.

BoolProperty.Name: LocalDebuggerMergeEnvironment
BoolProperty.Description: Merge specified environment variables with existing environment.
